extendedInfo.description: This application maximizes your device camera in the dark! Automatic adjustment of image parts to improve visibility in low light conditions.We have just released Hill Climb Racing, it's one of the most entertaining and addictive FREE driving game made for android!Like us on Facebook and stay tuned for all new cool releases and updates: http://www.facebook.com/FingersoftFeatures: - Adjustable light sensitivity - Save images by a single button press - Control camera flash to maximize visibility - Supports front camera if available (requires Android 2.3+) - Can be used to create cool photos in well lighted situations also, try adjusting the light sensitivity!Known issues: - Image orientation is incorrect on some tabletsDisclaimer: Because phone cameras don't involve usage of infrared, final quality of night vision is determined by your phones camera. This app takes all out of it, so it's up to the device how well you can see in the dark. You can always use this app just for creating cool looking photos.If you have any issues with the application don't hesitate to contact us at support@fingersoft.net.-----------------------Automated translation:-----------------------

reviews.comment: Takes pictures rather fast. I was having some fun with the kitties. You need some light but works well :)
reviews.author: lucidleo1

reviews.title: Would b nice if
reviews.comment: The night vision actually worked with out the light having to be on. Sadly you must have some kind of ambient light for it to come in clearly and would be nice if it supported video recording as well. Other than that the app is great just a couple more features need to be added.
reviews.author: Chris Easley

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Very cool App, works perfectly. I would def recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app, fun to explore and try different things with it. I gave it 5 stars (easy).
reviews.author: Ryan Biro

reviews.title: Perfect free app!
reviews.comment: Its the best free night vision app around ! Works superbly awesomely good ! MUST HAVE !
reviews.author: Kumar Anshu

reviews.title: Fdfbff
reviews.comment: Very useless app! If i have to turn the light on then whats the point of having night vision? Might aswell just get the light app! Dont:t get this app! Very crap, waited till night for nothin
reviews.author: Maxim Isakov

reviews.title: its good
reviews.comment: beter than good  andy loves it. just needs little light thou. cool i c u naked lol
reviews.author: Cheyanne Lerat

reviews.title: Seems pretty good
reviews.comment: Good and fun to use. Needs decent ambient light though
reviews.author: John Young

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good. Not a real night vision of course camera of course, but it can help sometimes. It\'s also awesome for effects.
reviews.author: Yuran Dicianni

reviews.title: S3
reviews.comment: Fun app and very simple to use. Can be used at night as long as there is a light source (dim/moon) around or your camera light will do.
reviews.author: Thaddeus Morris

reviews.title: Best Free App..
reviews.comment: Absoluteliy awesome app, well coconfigured and easy to use. Works very well with no adds or forcecloses on my Sony Xperia Acro S.      :-)
reviews.author: tony farquhar

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: Very good app for seeing detail in the dark. Able to take useful pic in very low light. Much more detail than the standard color camara. Wish it could record video.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Night vision
reviews.comment: Good one but it still need a little amount of light in order to get a clear image. Keep up the good work !!
reviews.author: Nelson McMilan

reviews.title: Real funny
reviews.comment: Did not think it was this funny, but it is. It works so much better than i expected. The details are fantastic and so is the quality. Just like real Night Vision goggles!
reviews.author: Eystein H G

reviews.title: Can\'t see anything
reviews.comment: Too much noise in the image, I guess my camera sucks...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Pretty cool app. Haven\'t used it whole lot cause just got it. What little I have its cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!!
reviews.comment: One of the few night vision apps that is actually night vision, not just negative pictures. Not to mention it\'s free, which is always good. This app is not coming off my phone! Works very good when you need to find something under your seat in a movie theatre.
reviews.author: Noah Coker

reviews.title: Good work gentelmen
reviews.comment: Considering this app is working with no infra-red, its unbelieveable. If you give this app a bad rating, do some reasearch. If you\'re expecting some flawless, high def image  go to cabellas and get you some goggles.  Lemme know how much that was.  Awesome job
reviews.author: Vinchenzo Hildago

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: I was able to shoot an image in the dark that I couldn\'t see in normal camera mode. I could see it with the naked eye. Of course the human eye is a greater design than phone camera available today. This app works great considering that it needs some light to function.
reviews.author: sherman Beach

reviews.title: Need Video recordings
reviews.comment: Its really a good app. For the likes who love to go out at night or even be in dark places, its really cool. Maybe you could add the video recorder in, so it might be better with us doing some ghost hunting :)
reviews.author: A Google User
